title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Hello again frens. What an exciting first week of $oDOGE it has been!Before we get to the news, let’s do a quick recap of the first 5 days:*145ETH in BURNED LP*50% of supply BURNED*1,020 $oDOGE holders*$3mil+/day in volume*1,515 members in TG*Huge support from Bitcoin OGs, Memecoin OGs, and influencers such as Bitlord*Entire “Ordinal Memecoin” meta has taken off with 50+ “o-SOMETHING” tokens launched, all started by $oDOGE!link yapmaExtremely impressive growth for just the first 5 days, but everything changes today.Yes, $oDOGE is the first real memecoin on Bitcoin… but what if I told you that the TRUE culture significance of $oDOGE didn’t occur until just a few hours ago… in the form of Ordinal Inscription #5768!The $oDOGE Emblem Vault has acquired Ordinal Inscription #5768, the true first ever DOGE on Bitcoin, in an OTC trade for the value of 10BTC in $oDOGE tokens… that makes it the 2nd highest Ordinal sale to date!!Thanks to a Bitcoin OG (and OTC middleman Teddy Bitcoins), the $oDOGE team were able to secure the FIRST EVER DOGE ORDINAL ON BITCOIN for our $oDOGE Emblem Vault in an OTC trade valued at 10BTC in $oDOGE tokens (thank you to the whales who helped us OTC these tokens!).At 10BTC this makes the sale of Ordinal Inscription #5768 the 2nd highest Ordinal sale to date, and it will be FOREVER stored in our Emblem Vault address alongside the $oDOGE Logo OrdinalWith Ordinal Inscription #5768 being added to our fractionalized vault, the $oDOGE token is now TRULY FOREVER representative of the first ever DOGE on Bitcoin!This action is what solidifies $oDOGE ’s place in Bitcoin, Ordinal, and Memecoin history forever. Ordinal Inscription #5768 can NEVER be moved from the Emblem Vault as we burned 50% of the fractionalized tokens, March 3rd 2023 begins a new era of Bitcoin Meme Culture!Links:Website: https://odoge.co/Twitter: https://twitter.com/OrdinalDogecoinTelegram: https://t.me/oDOGE_CommunityCA: 0x796a4503b444a71b331c9556bef0815237ddeabcEmblem Vault: https://emblem.finance/nft?id=48597102078039931Emblem Vault Contents: https://ordinalswallet.com/address/151KP2ERYZmsBuLDBHt9kkZv3avtCx6sLy
